thread.title: Experience The Best Of Hotlanta With Two New Packages From Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead

author: cbs8
title: Experience The Best Of Hotlanta With Two New Packages From Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead
text:
Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead
Hotel in Atlanta entices guests with the Atlanta CityPASS Package and LEGOLAND Discovery Center Atlanta Package
ATLANTA , Aug. 27, Travelers can fuel up for a fun fall getaway when experiencing Atlanta's hottest attractions with special new packages from Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead that will save some cold cash.
Whether seeking romance or spurring adventures with the whole family, visitors are in for a trip they'll always remember at one of the premier hotels in Buckhead . With the Atlanta CityPASS Package , guests will enjoy deluxe accommodations with up to two Atlanta CityPASS booklets, each featuring admission to Fernbank Museum of Natural History or College Football Hall of Fame plus the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola, Inside CNN Studio Tour, Zoo Atlanta or Center for Civil and Human Rights. And with rates from just $209 to $319 a night, there's never been a better opportunity to explore all of the excitement the city has to offer.
Guests traveling with a younger crowd can build up the fun with the LEGOLAND Discovery Center Atlanta Package , featuring deluxe accommodations with four tickets to LEGOLAND (two adults and two children) at rates as low as $179 to $289 a night.
No matter which Atlanta hotel package guests choose to use, they'll also enjoy a variety of complimentary amenities at the Buckhead hotel, including Wi-Fi, a shuttle service to attractions within 3 miles, hot breakfast served daily and on-site parking.
Just minutes from the MARTA, Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead is the perfect spot to stay when craving a bite of The Big Peach. In addition to LEGOLAND, the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola, CNN Studio, Zoo Atlanta, Center for Civil and Human Rights, Fernbank Museum of Natural History and College Football Hall of Fame, guests will enjoy easy access to Lenox Square Mall, Phipps Plaza and the Georgia Dome.
Following an adventure-filled day, travelers can retreat to relaxation in the hotel's spacious suites . Boasting fully equipped kitchens and separate areas to dine, work and rest, the Buckhead hotel is perfect for families wishing to spread out while still staying close. Stay active and entertained with spacious work desks and flat-panel TVs, or get a good night's rest with luxurious bedding and piles of fluffy pillows.
Guests nursing leftover energy can continue the fun in the sparkling outdoor pool, or enjoy a brisk workout in the on-site fitness center, featuring cardiovascular equipment and free weights.
To take advantage of the Atlanta CityPASS Package, book reservations using promotional code XYO. For the LEGOLAND Discovery Center Atlanta Package, mention promotional code ARN when booking online or by calling 1-800-228-9290. Both deals are available through Oct. 31, 2015 .
About Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead
Residence Inn Atlanta Buckhead at 2960 Piedmont Road NE in Atlanta, GA is near Lenox Square Mall, Phipps Plaza and Shepherd Center Atlanta. The hotel features 2 floors with 136 suites, 1 meeting room with 609 square feet of flexible event space, a fitness center and outdoor pool. For information, visit www.marriott.com/ATLBH or call 1-404-239-0677.
Learn more about Residence Inn and Marriott International Inc.
